mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, mobile, user_type, password, nickname, last_login_ip, last_login_date, status, last_login_device, company_id, parent_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, surname,name, card_no, email, country_code,level, auth_status,company_auth_status, driving_license_no, attachment_id_4, gdl, attachment_id_5
mapper.update:
update t_user
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_auth_status =#{companyAuthStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

auth_status = #{authStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_auth_status =#{companyAuthStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email =#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update t_user set parent_id = '',company_auth_status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@Auth_No} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update t_user set parent_id = '',company_auth_status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@Auth_No} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and parent_id = #{upId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.data_status, a.desp, a.mobile, a.password, a.nickname, a.last_login_ip, a.last_login_date, a.status, a.last_login_device, a.company_id, a.parent_id, a.attachment_id_1, a.attachment_id_2, a.attachment_id_3, a.surname,a.name, a.card_no, a.email,a.level,a.auth_status,a.company_auth_status, a.driving_license_no, a.attachment_id_4, a.gdl, a.attachment_id_5, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as attachment_id_1_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',c.attachment_link) as attachment_id_2_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',d.attachment_link) as attachment_id_3_link , concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',e.attachment_link) as attachment_id_4_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',f.attachment_link) as attachment_id_5_link from t_user a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id left join t_attachment c on a.attachment_id_2 = c.id left join t_attachment d on a.attachment_id_3 = d.id left join t_attachment e on a.attachment_id_4 = e.id left join t_attachment f on a.attachment_id_5 = f.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
